Store

La Filmoth√®que Store

Welcome to La Filmoth√®que Store! The store is a wonderful place: it helps us raise money to continue investing in the website, and it also helps promote some of the good people who keep the industry going. It is also a place to sit back, grab a coffee, and do some shopping!

Recommended items
DVD & Bluray
Box sets

City Lights (Blu-ray + DVD)

Rating:
★ ★ ★ ★ ★

Douglas sirk‚Äôs classic melodrama about An upper-class widow who falls in love with a much younger, down-to-earth nurseryman, much to the disapproval of her children and criticism of her country club peers. Criterion collection did a pretty spectacular job in preserving this highly accurate, vivid technicolor film. Finally a 2K resolution film transfer that does justice to these carefully framed, breathtaking shots.
